content: व्यंजनं {@--1@} Making clear, indicating, manifesting. {@--2@} A mark, token, sign. {@--3@} A reminder; <ls>Māl. 9.</ls> {@--4@} Disguise, garb; नानाव्यंजनाः प्रणिधयः <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 56</ls>; तपस्विव्यंजनोपेताः &c. {@--5@} A consonant. {@--6@} A mark of the sex, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the male or female organ. {@--7@} Insignla. {@--8@} A mark or sign of puberty. {@--9@} The beard. {@--10@} A limb, member. {@--11@} ({%a%}) A condiment, sauce, a seasoned article; <ls>N. 16. 104</ls>. ({%b%}) An article used in seasoning food, spices &c. {@--12@} The last of the three powers of a word by virtue of which it suggests or insinuates a sense; see अंजन-ना (8) (written व्यंजना also in this sense). {@--13@} A day. {@--14@} A privy part.
